texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.IssueTracking:CanNotLockAnOpenIssue: Can not lock a an open issue! Close it first
texts.IssueTracking:CanNotOpenLockedIssue: Can not open a locked issue! Unlock it first.
texts.IssueTracking:ConcurrentOpenIssueLimit: Can not assign more than 3 open issues to a user concurrently
texts.IssueTracking:IssueWithSameTitleExists: There is already an issue with the same title
texts.IssueDeletionConfirmationMessage: Are you sure to delete the issue '{0}'?
